summary: Vale Skinned Horses. Once an idea to make a mod out of it. They sitting for years  in my folders and i am doing nothing with them. Hours of work and nobody can enjoy them. With a little knowledge to use for your own personaly gameplay.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=4]

[/size][/b][size=6][u][color=#f6b26b]Vale Horse[/color][/u][/size]
Like to ride you're own exclusive horse, 'that' specialy horse for  Woodelves.

Once an idea to make a mod out of it. Well...they sitting for years  in my folders and i am doing nothing with them. Hours of work and nobody can enjoy them.
The eyes & tail, the new g_dds  & n.dds textures are my own work. The main horse texture is created from  vanilla Vale Animals.
It is possible to make the spots glow like the vale animals becuase of the g.dds.


Insted to let them useless sitting and catch dust in my folders i put them up for you to use in your personal game or for a mod as long nothing of  the textures are included within the mod file itself .A Small link to here &  little credit for my work is apreciated. [color=#e69138][b]
(not sure what i can or not can do with vanilla edited textures from dlc's or if i can put them up as recourse)
[/b][/color]
[color=#f6b26b]- Esp file is in the main file, Riften horse will be changed .


Why can't i download it with my NMM ?[/color]
Because i don't play Skryim for years now and don't even whant to download the tool . I don't whant to make a horse mod for it.
[size=3]y[/size]ou realy need a littlebit of knowledge to add them to your own horse. Making the spots glow you need to add property to the  nif in Niftool.


If you use a standalone horse mod,just rename them into the right dds file names and replace them.

[color=#f6b26b]Textures:[/color]
eye.dds
eye_g.dds
ValeHorse.dds
ValeHorse_g.dds
ValeHorse_n.dds
ValeMainTail.dds
(used vanilla normal map for the tail)



[color=#f6b26b][size=3]Maby More[/size][/color]
I think i will add later on these textures to

- Vale sadle with celtic leather parts

A Tiger horse skin ( i know i love the impossible)
[img]http://i66.tinypic.com/21jzqiq.jpg[/img]

author: Xazomn
